title: Implement save/load with shared_preferences
description: Save current level number on level transitions. Load on app start. Continue button loads saved level. New Game resets to level 1. If no save exists, Continue is disabled/greyed out.

title: Implement level system with 20 levels and score targets
description: Each level has a target score to advance. Level 1=1000pts, increasing by ~500 per level. Show progress bar. When target met, advance to next level. Beat level 20 = win screen.

title: Build 8x8 game board widget with grid layout
description: Create GameBoard widget that displays an 8x8 grid of jewels. Handle tap/drag input for selecting and swapping adjacent jewels.

title: Add dev scripts for flutter run --machine workflow
description: Created shell scripts (flutter-start.sh, flutter-reload.sh, flutter-stop.sh) for headless Flutter development via the machine JSON protocol using named pipes. Commit: fd28f35

title: Build main menu screen with New Game, Continue, Exit buttons
description: Create MainMenuScreen widget with three styled buttons. Wire up navigation to game screen. Exit should close the app. Style with sparkle/jewel theme.

title: Create jewel types and CustomPainter rendering
description: Define 7 jewel types (diamond, ruby, emerald, sapphire, topaz, amethyst, pearl) with distinct shapes and colors drawn via CustomPainter. No sprites - pure canvas drawing.

title: Write project README with full game documentation
description: Replaced boilerplate README with comprehensive documentation covering project structure, game logic, rendering, dev scripts, and the pure-Python icon generation pipeline. Commit: 9458299

title: Epic: Level Progression & Win/Loss
description: Implement 20 levels with increasing score targets, level transitions, win screen at level 20, and game over conditions.

title: Epic: Save/Load & Persistence
description: Persist game state (current level) using shared_preferences. Continue resumes at last level. New Game resets to level 1.

title: Generate custom launcher icon with pure Python
description: Created scripts/generate_icon.py that builds PNG launcher icons from scratch using only struct and zlib (no image libraries). Renders a pink faceted diamond on a deep purple background with sparkle accents. Outputs all 5 Android density buckets (mdpi through xxxhdpi). Commit: b545fdd

title: Epic: Match-3 Game Logic
description: Implement core Bejeweled mechanics: swap detection, match-3+ finding, cascading, board refill, scoring.

title: Set up Flutter project scaffold
description: Initial project setup with Flutter, pubspec.yaml, analysis_options, and Android configuration. Commit: 3eb6940

title: Implement no-moves detection and game over
description: After each move resolves, check if any valid moves remain. If not, game over. Show game over screen with option to retry level or return to menu.

title: Implement scoring system
description: Award points for matches: 3-match=50pts, 4-match=100pts, 5-match=200pts. Cascade multiplier increases with each cascade step. Display score on game HUD.

title: Implement swap validation, cascade, and board refill
description: Validate that a swap produces at least one match (reject otherwise). After matches are removed, cascade jewels down and fill empty spaces from top with random jewels. Repeat until no more matches exist.

title: Add swap and match animations
description: Animate jewel swaps (slide), match removal (fade/shrink), and cascade (drop). Keep animations snappy for good game feel.

title: Epic: Game Board & Jewel Rendering
description: Implement the 8x8 game board with custom-drawn jewels using Canvas/CustomPainter. Handle gem types, colors, and visual rendering.

title: Epic: Main Menu Screen
description: Create the main menu with New Game, Continue, and Exit buttons. This is the entry point of the app.

title: Implement match detection algorithm
description: Detect horizontal and vertical matches of 3+ same-type jewels. Return list of matched positions.
